inclusion.criterion: documented hemoglobin S-only, S-beta-thalassemia, or other sickle cell disease genotype
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: relatively well preserved renal and hepatic function (creatinine less than 1.6 mg/dl and normal liver function test less than 5 X normal ALT)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: severe sickle cell anemia with recurrent pain crisis (greater than or equal to 2 ER visits per year)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: hemoglobin S and A (trait) or hemoglobin A-only (non-sickle cell)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell crises since childhood and severe pain in his lower back that radiated to both thighs. He is afebrile within the normal blood pressure.
